channel.title: Pkpoints and pksystem
channel.description:
ok so me and my friend ryan are back to codeing servers :P ive got a donator zone, shops, npc's training ect ect, but i really would like to get a pkpoint shop up. ive seen in a few clients there is a "wanneshop" thing thats speically for pkpoint shops. or w/e. so heres my question
1. how do i add a pkpoint system ? so that you get say... 1 pk point per kill? 2. in character files how do i make it say "pkpoints" for instance like... donator = 0 for non donators. playerrights = 0 for non staff ect ect?
info. this is a 317. download client. no webclient yet. runesworld is name. my friend ryan found the client and source here. i made it completely blank all accept for custom items, everything else has been coded "by me" in addition to... npc's, shops, teleports, commands, interfaces blah blah blah. anyway someone help?

item.title: Pkpoints and pksystem
item.dc:creator: @calebsomthing calebsomthing
item.description:
@calebsomthing wrote:

ok so me and my friend ryan are back to codeing servers ive got a donator zone, shops, npc’s training ect ect, but i really would like to get a pkpoint shop up. ive seen in a few clients there is a “wanneshop” thing thats speically for pkpoint shops. or w/e. so heres my question

  1. how do i add a pkpoint system ? so that you get say… 1 pk point per kill?
  2. in character files how do i make it say “pkpoints” for instance like… donator = 0 for non donators. playerrights = 0 for non staff ect ect?

info. this is a 317. download client. no webclient yet. runesworld is name. my friend ryan found the client and source here. i made it completely blank all accept for custom items, everything else has been coded “by me” in addition to… npc’s, shops, teleports, commands, interfaces blah blah blah. anyway someone help?
